contents.content: UNIT 02 面试话题 Interview Topics
Lesson 6 兴趣爱好 Interests and Hobbies
面试官史密斯先生在询问求职者杰克的兴趣爱好。

contents.title: 史密斯：现在我们来谈谈你的兴趣爱好吧。
contents.answer: Smith: Now let's talk about your interests and hobbies.

contents.title: 杰克：好，我喜欢读书、散步、游泳、远足和打篮球。
contents.answer: Jack: Well, I like reading, walking, swimming, hiking and playing basketball.

contents.title: 史密斯：你的生活倒是多姿多彩。
contents.answer: Smith: You have a colorful life.

contents.title: 杰克：是的，这些爱好的确丰富了我的生活。
contents.answer: Jack: Yes. These hobbies have indeed enriched my life.

contents.content: 工作面试中的所有问题都是为了判断“你是个什么样的人”，以及你这样的人是否符合职位当前和未来的要求，有关你的兴趣爱好和业余时间安排的问题也不例外。

contents.title: 史密斯：那么，下班后你通常都做些什么？
contents.answer: Smith: How do you usually spend your time after work?

contents.title: 杰克：通常我喜欢泡一杯茶来看小说。
contents.answer: Jack: I prefer to read novels with a cup of tea.

contents.title: 史密斯：最吸引你的是什么书呢？
contents.answer: Smith: What kind of books interests you most?

contents.title: 杰克：侦探小说。
contents.answer: Jack: Detective books.

contents.content: 表面上是了解你的业余爱好，实则是考查你的爱好是否会影响到你的正常工作，回答时应尽量避免说：“我除了工作，没有什么爱好。”这可能意味着你性格孤僻，也可能让人觉得你是在说假话。

contents.title: 史密斯：看来你是个富有想象，又有逻辑思维的人。
contents.answer: Smith: You seem to be a man of imagination and logic.

contents.title: 杰克：在某种程度上，我把书当做我的好朋友。
contents.answer: Jack: To some extent, I regard books as my good companion.

contents.title: 史密斯：如果这样的话，你会受益多多。
contents.answer: Smith: If so, you can benefi t a lot from them.

contents.title: 杰克：的确如此。
contents.answer: Jack: That's for sure.

contents.content: 也要避免随意回答：“我喜欢跳舞、唱歌、看球赛。”那样可能会使人立即想到你是个“舞迷”、“歌迷”和“球迷”，可能会影响工作。最好是回答有时会读书、听音乐、养花、练书法和参加体育活动等。

contents.title: 1.他有很多爱好，例如唱歌、游泳、打篮球。
contents.answer: He has many hobbies, such as singing, swimming and playing basketball.

contents.title: 2.她很喜欢出游。
contents.answer: She is quite fond of travelling.

contents.title: 3.她工作之余的消遣是听古典音乐。
contents.answer: She likes listening to classical music for entertainment after work.

contents.title: 4.熬夜时，她喜欢喝一杯咖啡。
contents.answer: She always has a cup of coffee when she has to stay up late.

contents.title: 5.他喜欢爬山，却不喜欢远足。
contents.answer: He likes climbing mountains, but he doesn't like hiking.

contents.title: 6.结束了一天的辛苦工作后，你通常有什么消遣？
contents.answer: How do you usually entertain yourself after a day's hard work?

contents.title: 7.若说消遣，她喜欢看电影。
contents.answer: As for entertainment, she enjoys watching movies.

contents.title: 8.周末他喜欢上网。
contents.answer: He enjoys surfi ng the Internet on weekends.

contents.title: 9.晚上看小说可以让她放松自己。
contents.answer: Reading novels in the evening can help her relax.

contents.title: 10.她很喜欢读书，却不喜欢在下雨天读书。
contents.answer: She likes reading very much, but she doesn't like reading on rainy days.

contents.hanyi: n. 同伴，志趣相投的人
